title: NEW GAME MODE IDEA!!!
body:
It's a really quaint idea that takes just as little effort to make as URF and One For All: 

I don't got a cool name for it. "Mayhem" or something.

It's basically Summoner's Rift, but starting at the 50:00 minute mark, and everyone starts at level 18 with 100,000 gold 

Creeps: Each team gets all 3 of every dragon buff, Baron and Elder are already waiting to be killed, and all jungle camps and minion waves spawn in twice as frequently

Stacks: Nasus gets 600 stacks, Veigar gets 300, Cho gets 20, Sion gets 1200, Kayn can immediately ascend to either path, Bard has 50 chimes (idk what constitudes for a normal amount for bard), Manamune and Archangel's Staff are fully upgraded, the new runes that have capped scaling (Eyeball Collection, Legend, Hunter, The Ultimate Hat, etc.) are completely capped, infinitely scaling runes (Grasp of the Undying, Overgrowth, etc.) can stop at a certain amount that you think would be healthy, and whatever I missed

#But then triple the turrets' damage and health, please

It would be a good game more for people who want to truly enjoy how the late game feels, for all those unlucky souls who get camped in the early game and can't enjoy the benefits their champions can offer

replies.body: This reminds me of overtime in sports, or a death match.
That seems something more viable in howling abyss
Either way, it'd be great for people who wouldn't dare stray away from the early game meta for more than a weekend
